story:
Our Campaign

Motorsports is exciting in any form;  Motocross, Stock Car, Indy Car, Formula One, Drag Racing and more...704 Motorsports is looking to take it to another level and be an agent of change by  introducing the sport and job opportunities to those that never considered it to be possible.

My name is Dionne Davis, Owner & CEO of 704 Motorsports LLC. I have obtained a degree in Motorsports Management and now I intend on helping others achieve their goals as it pertains to Motorsports.

WarZone To WorkZone is a great opportunity to not only help our veterans, but with a successful race team, allow others to follow their dream of becoming drivers, riders, mechanics, graphic artist, and engineers. As a disabled veteran myself, I know the importance of serving those that served our country. I have met many veterans if given a chance, would love to work in Motorsports.

The success of this campaign will open the door for many to be employed, going back to school, and finding hope where there once was no hope. A successful campaign will do the following:

  • Funding for the Veterans that includes housing, marketing materials, and a van to insure transportation to appointments and school.
  • Help's DJ & Michael get their teams off to a great season.
  • Help to set a firm financial foundation for WarZone to WorkZone.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding will go towards several things. Michael's run in K& N East, DJ's run in AMA Motocross. Facilities, Housing & Marketing for the Veteran's program. We need the teams to be successful so our veteran’s program can be all that it can be.  Successful teams will secure employment for the veterans.

We are in the  Community section and not Sports…Because 704 Motorsports is the vehicle to drive the true purpose, Warzone to Workzone. Its impact will be felt in every community, city and state across the nation.

AWESOME PERKS! We have various levels of perks that include Vouchers for NASCAR Racing Experience, Miniature Helmets, Duffle Bags, Official Pit Crew Uniforms, Motorcycle Crew Jerseys, T-shirts, Lanyards & Key Chains.

If we do not meet the entire goal, this will still help get a good start to the season and the veteran's program...I KNOW WE WILL NOT ONLY MEET, BUT SUCCEED OUR GOAL!

The Impact

It is hard breaking into this industry. With your help, we can make a huge impact in the area of the unemployed, and/or disabled veterans.

I want to reach across the nation to inspire and encourage! To bring hope to the hopeless.

Other Ways You Can Help

I am delighted that you choose to help. Spread the word by using the social networking tools provided by Indiegogo.

We also have  "The Super Perk" for the referral contest.

We are driven to excellence and winning with integrity. Thank you for helping us to Change lives. One driver, one rider and one veteran at a time.

story:
We need help!! My family is trying to raise money to help offset Lawyer costs from a custody battle. We have already spent thousands and we need an extra $15,000 to fight for the safety of the child at trial, in April. This is to save a child that suffered unspeakable abuse under the care of their Mother (who was found in neglect of a child, by the state). We had to go for emergency custody back in December 2012, after the child revealed abuse, under the care of their mother.  In order to keep the child safe and get the evidence to the judge, we have to go to trial. Please give whatever you can to help us keep our child safe and in a better environment. All funds will go to help fund our lawyer. We can't get our story out to the judge. unless we go to trial. We can't afford the price it will cost to go to trial and we need your help. Your donation will help save a child from a history of abuse and neglect. Please give what you can. Thank you.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Greetings!

 

Hello, and thank you for visiting our philanthropic effort site for the Pediatric Services of JFK Medical Center.  Our need is very much ever present, and we appreciate you taking the time to consider donating to this very worthy cause.

It's an exciting time here at JFK Medical Center.  Our Pediatric department is preparing for a year full of new beginnings, and we are already on track towards a year of extraordinary progress.

We are breaking new ground, renovating our facility to enhance our patient care.  Our new Maternal and Child unit is scheduled for renovations and technological upgrades in 2014.  The new unit will provide the children, newborns and their mothers a state of the art facility with access to a conducive environment for the families. 

Looking ahead, we are focused on creating an environment that embodies a philosophy of not just treating Pediatric patients, but treating each individual child.

Your support will surely help us to accelerate and expand our scope of care in the areas of neonatal, emergency and neurological care for children with various disorders through your generous donations.

Thanks to your support, our caregivers have touched the lives of thousands of children - whether they faced an urgent need, a devastating disease or sought to improve their quality of life.

We are honored by any support you are able to provide, and grateful for your commitment to ensure JFK Medical Center exceeds expectations and impacts the lives of these children, our youngest patients, far into the future.

 

The Mission of the JFK Foundation:

The mission is simple - to generate philanthropy and awareness to financially support JFK Medical Center as a leader in advanced medical care for the region.  The process and act of giving is a personal action that demonstrates a deep commitment to what we do.

Your generous gift will help to bring new options to our Pediatric patients and transform the way they are treated within our medical center.  Your contributions will increase our ability to provide novel insights into how we care for our youngest patients.

Charitable gifts to the JFK Pediatric Philanthropy effort improve quality, services, and accessibility to healthcare, touching individual lives every day while at the same time providing benefit to the entire community by helping to provide affordable, quality healthcare to all.

The Impact

The total monies raised by your donations will go directly towards funding our important programs and services that benefit so many children from Central New Jersey and beyond.

As a non-profit community health system, we rely on these groups to help us secure the latest technology, attract the best medical and clinical staff and provide the compassionate, patient-centered care for which we are nationally recognized. 

It has always been our commitment to give our all to make this Pediatic Department one of the best in New Jersey.  We hope you will join us and share in our vision and optimism for our exciting future!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, and easily share this campaign and our efforts on your Facebook page and Twitter account!

THANK YOU!

story:
WHAT IS FUEGO?

After years of dreaming, planning, and hard work, we have finally realized a dream come true. We are a small coffee shop and micro-roaster, taking pride in sourcing, roasting, and brewing the best coffee we can.  

Though our coffee shop has only been open for several months, we have been very well received - to the point that our hand brew methods can be, at times, too slow to keep up with a line of customers. We have become familiar with a new system, the Alpha Dominche Steampunk 4.1, which recreates pour over brew methods in only 60 to 90 seconds, rather than the normal 3 to 6 minutes our hand brew methods currently take. This machine will allow us to brew coffee at a faster pace, while keeping the flavor integrity of the hand brew methods.

Being a very young business, we are not yet able to cover the cost of this machine ourselves. This is where you come in! By contributing toward our goal of acquiring this brew system, you will help us meet our ever increasing customer demand. Plus, you get some sweet prizes as a thank you for your help!


What We Need & What You Get

To be able to fully achieve our goal, we will need to raise $20,000. This covers the cost of the Steampunk itself, as well as shipping, installing, and the cost of learning the new system. 

If you are able to contribute towards this exciting opportunity, we have some really sweet perks to offer as a thank you! These include: 

  • Limited edition coffees (!)
  • Limited edition shirts
  • One bag of coffee per month, three months
  • Latte art and home brewing method classes
  • Private party for ten
  • Origin trip to source beans with Tony and Renee

In the event that we are unable to reach our goal, the funds we do raise will get put aside and saved until we do have the funds for the Steampunk; it would just be purchased at a later date.


The Impact

Once we are able to get the Steampunk hooked up and brewing, our current and future customers will be able to enjoy the coffee they've come  to love, in the style they prefer, at a much faster pace! Over the months, our customers have loved watching the business evolve, and regularly share our excitement for each growing phase. Additionally, the machine will draw an even greater number of customers, as this will be the first Steampunk in western New York, and one of fewer than two dozen in the whole country.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with everyone you know! Twitter, Facebook, Google+, word of mouth, e-mail, phone call, text, blog post, all of the above! Indiegogo has a few share tools below to make it simple.

story:
About The Accident

Josiah took a nasty fall on Saturday November 16, 2013 and was found unconscious in the early morning hours. His injuries include:

  • Fractured skull
  • Fractured neck vertebrae 
  • Broken jaw
  • No vision out of one eye

The Doctor's Prognosis 

Currently Josiah is in critical but stable condition in the ICU. The amazing news is that most of the injuries should heal naturally. *Update* The doctors believe Josiah may remain blind in his right ever for the rest of his life. He is looking to be released from the ICU this week...so there is definitely a bright light at the end of this tunnel still! 

  • He will likely require facial reconstruction
  • The skull fracture actually across his forehead, over to his left eye and then back behind his ear and to the base of his skull. The doctor said this should heal naturally without any disfiguration to his head
  • The fractured neck vertebrae should also heal on their own

Why We Need Your Support

  • Very high medical bills
  • No health insurance
  • Josiah had just started a new job and was just finishing the timeline before being put on the company plan
  • His family has no vacation time away from their jobs
  • Josiah always paid it forward and lived a Chive lifestyle of kindness and compassion for others. We are releasing a video later this week that will take a look deeper into who Josiah was as a person and a Chive brother.

Show Your Support Friday December 6

Chive on Sioux Falls is hosting our first unofficial meet up on Friday December 6, 2013 at Icon Lounge in downtown Sioux Falls, SD. The event is called KCCO for Josiah and is dedicated to helping out a brother in need.

Please see the perks below, redeemable at the event.

story:
Who I am...

I've been a knitter for over 40 years.  I love knitting, and all things knit.  Most people would say it is absolutely my passion.  I share that passion by knitting for friends and family, enjoying the company of other knitters at a weekly knitting and crocheting group and teaching knitting classes.  I wanted to be able to do more.  

For the past month I've been knitting feverishly for my, soon to arrive, great nephew.  I realized as I knit, that just as I had when I knit for my own babies, I was trying to infuse each stitch with love.  I think that is common for knitters and crocheters.  I wanted to find a way to share that love with children who needed it the most.

It struck me that the knitting and crocheting community is not only enormous, but also incredibly loving and giving.

What I Want to Do... 

I came up with the idea of knitting and crocheting hats for pre-schoolers.  I thought, how cool would it be for 2-4 year olds to be able to pick a hand made, creative hat?  I wanted to do it!

What I want to do is simple.  I want to partner with our local Head Start program and make sure every pre-schooler has a new hat for next winter.  I wanted each hat to be as unique as its recipient.

I know I can come up with the knitters and crocheters, we're all about giving back.  I also know that sometimes the people that want to give are strapped by economic constraints.  I wanted to be able to give everyone the opportunity to share their love and creativity.  If I can provide yarn to every one that wants to contribute and can't, because of economic diffiulties, this would be a huge success.  

What We Need & What You Get....

We need $2,500.00 to be able to purchase yarn and ship it to interested knitters/crocheters.  Although, many knitters and crocheters will have a "stash" from which to produce hats, for others the cost of yarn will be a hindrance to their participation.  Our ability to provide the yarn will help make this a success.

Every donor will recieve a very heart felt thank you!  Each hat created with your donation will have your name, city and state/country on the hang tag, as well as the volunteer knitter/crocheter's name.

Some of the other perks include stickers, magnets, and a special shout out on our "Knit Wit" board!

If we don't reach our goal, perhaps we won't be able to provide the number of hats we want to.  However it works out, we will still run our program, I just hate the idea that not all of the children will receive hats.

The Impact...

How wonderful is it to know that this coming winter you will have been the person that gave a new, unique hat to a pre-schooler? We will definitely post pictures of the hats, and some of the recipients on our website and Facebook page.  

In the past I've knit hats for preemies and for chemo patients.  I have always felt these are important causes and have loved contributing.  I wanted something a little different, a group that hasn't had the opportunity to feel the "love" of a new, handmade hat.  

Other Ways You Can Help....

I know that not everyone is in a position to contribute monetarily, so if you would like to contribute, become one of our knitters/crocheters.  If you're interested in donating hats you've made, they must be new, made from acrylic yarn, and machine washable. The only limitation is your imagination!

All that we ask is that you get the word out.  Help us make this campaign a success!  Tell your friends, family, coworkers, well, just everyone!  Indiegogo makes spreading the word easy, just use the share tools!

Thank you so much for your time and support.

 

Come see us at http://knitwitlove.com
story_txt:
Who I am...
I've been a knitter for over 40 years.  I love knitting, and all things knit.  Most people would say it is absolutely my passion.  I share that passion by knitting for friends and family, enjoying the company of other knitters at a weekly knitting and crocheting group and teaching knitting classes.  I wanted to be able to do more.  
For the past month I've been knitting feverishly for my, soon to arrive, great nephew.  I realized as I knit, that just as I had when I knit for my own babies, I was trying to infuse each stitch with love.  I think that is common for knitters and crocheters.  I wanted to find a way to share that love with children who needed it the most.
It struck me that the knitting and crocheting community is not only enormous, but also incredibly loving and giving.

What I Want to Do... 
I came up with the idea of knitting and crocheting hats for pre-schoolers.  I thought, how cool would it be for 2-4 year olds to be able to pick a hand made, creative hat?  I wanted to do it!
What I want to do is simple.  I want to partner with our local Head Start program and make sure every pre-schooler has a new hat for next winter.  I wanted each hat to be as unique as its recipient.
I know I can come up with the knitters and crocheters, we're all about giving back.  I also know that sometimes the people that want to give are strapped by economic constraints.  I wanted to be able to give everyone the opportunity to share their love and creativity.  If I can provide yarn to every one that wants to contribute and can't, because of economic diffiulties, this would be a huge success.  


What We Need & What You Get....
We need $2,500.00 to be able to purchase yarn and ship it to interested knitters/crocheters.  Although, many knitters and crocheters will have a "stash" from which to produce hats, for others the cost of yarn will be a hindrance to their participation.  Our ability to provide the yarn will help make this a success.
Every donor will recieve a very heart felt thank you!  Each hat created with your donation will have your name, city and state/country on the hang tag, as well as the volunteer knitter/crocheter's name.
Some of the other perks include stickers, magnets, and a special shout out on our "Knit Wit" board!
If we don't reach our goal, perhaps we won't be able to provide the number of hats we want to.  However it works out, we will still run our program, I just hate the idea that not all of the children will receive hats.


The Impact...
How wonderful is it to know that this coming winter you will have been the person that gave a new, unique hat to a pre-schooler? We will definitely post pictures of the hats, and some of the recipients on our website and Facebook page.  
In the past I've knit hats for preemies and for chemo patients.  I have always felt these are important causes and have loved contributing.  I wanted something a little different, a group that hasn't had the opportunity to feel the "love" of a new, handmade hat.  


Other Ways You Can Help....
I know that not everyone is in a position to contribute monetarily, so if you would like to contribute, become one of our knitters/crocheters.  If you're interested in donating hats you've made, they must be new, made from acrylic yarn, and machine washable. The only limitation is your imagination!
All that we ask is that you get the word out.  Help us make this campaign a success!  Tell your friends, family, coworkers, well, just everyone!  Indiegogo makes spreading the word easy, just use the share tools!
Thank you so much for your time and support.
 
Come see us at http://knitwitlove.com

story:
What is WORKHAUS?

WORKHAUS is Toronto’s newest coworking space, opening November 2014. Once we are totally up to speed, we will be the home of up to 300 start-up businesses, creative freelancers, and entrepreneurs. 

Coworking spaces are not just places to work – they are hubs of collaboration, where brilliant people from similar and diverse backgrounds come together to share ideas, inspire, and feed of each other’s energy. 

Out of the up-and-coming individuals and companies that are a part of Workhaus, some are going to move on to do big things – HUGE things! It’s going to happen, and we will be the loudest cheerleaders out there, proud to think that maybe we had just an inkling to do with their success.


Where is WORKHAUS?

We occupy the entire top floor of a wonderful heritage brick and beam building in the heart of downtown Toronto.

  • Across the street from the world-famous St. Lawrence Market
  • A short walk from King Station, and
  • Just meters from the nearest streetcar stop

Address: 100 Front St E, 4th floor, Toronto, ON, M5A 1E1, Canada

www.workhausoffice.com


Why do we want to open WORKHAUS?

Our m/o is not just to stick a bunch of people in a room and hope for the best. We will be there, fostering relationships, providing ample opportunities for networking, throwing parties, and implementing programs to keep people accountable to their goals – building an awesome community! 

We have a big, bright, awesome location right across from the St. Lawrence Market. We’ve built a place that looks great and feels right. We are literally steps from transit, fast food, fresh food, great pubs, and coffee – but you don’t need to buy coffee, we’ve got you covered for free, 24/7.




Why Crowdfunding?

We have a goal at WORKHAUS – to make things as easy and as comfortable for our members by offering innovative services and amenities. The way we see it, if we take care of the small stuff, you don’t have to. The better we make you look, the better we look. We are all set for a November 2014 launch, and already have in place some great perks, but we are crowdfunding now to raise funds so that we can do the AMAZING things that go above and beyond, and enhance our members’ experience.

We are also crowdfunding to get the word out about WORKHAUS, and we are offering some pretty great incentives for those who want to jump on the train early on! For those in the Toronto area, there are some great discounts on space for monthly rentals, short trial packages to try us out, and even sponsor packages. For those not local to Toronto there still are some great perks, but if you do contribute and can’t really use our services, we will be super grateful and if you ever do make it out to Toronto, we’ll take you out for a night out you probably won’t remember!


How will the funds be allocated?

Funds raised in this campaign will be earmarked for three main initiatives:

1) UPGRADE THE TELECOM SYSTEM -- We will invest in a robust teleconferencing infrastructure to ensure that our members have access to the best conferencing systems available so they are represented exquisitely when dealing with remote clients. 

2) A VIDEO AND PHOTOGRAPHY STUDIO -- We will build in a collapsible mobile professional studio. It will be used for things like clients'  social media videos, headshots, product shoots, fashion shoots etc. 

3) FASHION INCUBATOR -- We will purchase equipment and materials (including sewing machines, sergers, drafting tables, computers) to launch our fashion incubator within WORKHAUS, where we will accept several great up-and-coming designers into a program so unique it is unheard of! (But let's keep it a secret between us, friends, for now.)

4) STRETCH GOAL -- if we exceed our funding goal, we will use the funds to upgrade and improve the facility to provide even more comfort and amenities for our members.


Rewards

We wanted to recognize every contributor, that's why


Higher amounts get a cool bow tie or collar



Check out more rewards on the right side of the page------>


    The Impact

    We’re not changing the world here, but hopefully we are raising the co-working bar so that someday, one of the start-ups that launch out of Workhaus actually can make a significant difference. In the meantime, let’s build a diverse, energetic community in Toronto’s St. Lawrence district and let’s stir the pot!

    Risks & Challenges

    • Operational hiccups - growing pains. We expect to go through all the challenges attributed to starting a new business. But we are confident that the team we've assembled is able to overcome these as they arise.
    • Construction delays. Construction is currently at 95%. We have made huge progress since we shot the video. There are small touchups left here and there and we are tirelessly working around the clock to be open-ready and have a soft opening on October 21.
    • Competition. Of course there are other great co-working spaces in Toronto. We are focused on creating the best environment possible and will never stop improving and innovating. We have a great facility in a great location and have vast, deep networks, all of the ingredients necessary to be a vibrant hub of activity, learning, and networking!



      (Video Correction: Everybody who contributes $1000 or more will receive a metal plaque on our Founders Wall). Also note that many of our perks include a gift certificate to our partner restaurant, The Corner Place, which is located on the ground floor of the Workhaus building. Please note that these certificates are not redeemable for cash, and do not include taxes and gratuities. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      You may look at our incentives offered and think, “that’s not for me!” You may have no use for our services, and although you’d like to help us out because we’re a swell bunch, it doesn’t make financial sense for you to contribute to our fund. We get it. You feel bad that you can’t help out because you are likewise a swell person, but please don’t feel bad! You can absolutely help us out by spreading the word throughout your networks, because, well, who knows. And you know what? We will be just as grateful to you for spreading the word, so thank you!

story:
Short Summary

Now only a handful of progressive states are allowing individuals to grow and share the medicine they need, that at the federal level isn't allow. Because of this discrimination and harassment I have launched a community website by and for the cannabis community where it is legally allowed.

What We Need 

We need $4,200 to pay for advertising and to would like to join the NORML Business Network (NBN). The NBN cost anywhere from $1500 to $5000 per year and the cost for advertising on Google on Facebook can run $100's per month.

The Impact

The Good News is Safeaccess420.com is already up and running! Advertising will give us the push we need to become the "Go to" safe site for the community.

Risks & Challenges

We are self regulating with a user flagging system to quickly identify illegal and inappropriate postings. Users may flag postings they believe to be in violation of our guidelines. 
In looking to the future as our needs grow so will our servers, internet bandwidth and development costs. All good things in a company that provides a much needed service.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are looking to spread the word to help promote the service we are offering free advertising to all NORML offices. Our user ads are always free. Please help us spread the word.

story:
To all of our friends,

As some of you may know, we are in a pivotal point in our project. When we approached the owner of our building to renew our sales contract and our lease, she declined and put the property on the market at a price of $1,100,000. We made an offer and settled at $980,000 with a closing date of September 10th.  We immediately sought financing to complete the purchase, however, since we are a relatively new business, our revenue history does not meet the criteria for traditional bank financing.  The owner of the building has other interested buyers who are likely to develop the property as apartments with retail space on the ground floor.

In order for us to continue with the Central Hotel project we need to raise funds and find partners to complete the purchase of the building now. We will be launching a campaign in the next week and asking for your help telling our story and spreading the word about our current need for support. As much as we want our project to succeed, as a member of the community we do business in, we do not want to see another residential and storefront development that is likely unaffordable for local owned businesses and residents. This is a critical opportunity to retain a piece of the community we love as growth and development march on around us. We want to keep the corner on the Plaza a fun, community friendly place to be, and, more importantly, keep this project and everyone’s hard work alive.

The previous business at our location was operated by a Tigard resident with 2 employees who were from the eastern and western ends of the Portland Metro area.  We live within 5 blocks of our business and currently employ 8 staff, over 85% of whom are North Portland residents.

-Brent and Risa Davis


Our Project

 The Central Hotel project is a small boutique hotel soon to be adjacent to the Plaza, a City park in the central St. Johns Business District. This 4 story, 36 room boutique hotel will help build a cohesive environment in the core of the downtown St. Johns area. The hotel will have a restaurant on the main floor, a 4th floor lounge and a roof top deck and event space. The closest hotel and lodging is 4 miles from this location. The hotel will provide much needed services to the local area including the University of Portland, the Port District, cyclists, hikers, bird watchers, and local residents. Cathedral Park is becoming one of the most sought out wedding locations in Portland. The hotel will be able to serve all of these needs.
This project was started by local St. Johns residents Brent and Risa Davis and Kevin White, a St. Helens resident with a very extensive history in hotel management and development.

Key goals

  1. Attract tourist and business travel dollars to the local business district
  2. Help create a synergistic core plaza area
  3. Bring in a high quality farm-to-table restaurant
  4. Provide excellent accommodations to visitors, friends, and travelers
  5. Work closely with all of the local organizations, farmer's market, neighborhood associations, and municipalities
  6. Provide a solid return to our investors
  7. Create local jobs for local residents direct and indirect
  8. Generate a positive catalyst effect on the businesses in our community

This project is also a restoration project. Under the dated facade on this building are remnants of the 1904 exterior of the original Central Hotel. The exterior will be renovated to honor its original glory. The builder for this project will be Pacific Crest Construction with an extensive background in both restoration and new construction of restaurants and hotels. Their portfolio includes all of the McMenamins restorations projects.

story:
“We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give.”
― Winston Churchill

I came up with the idea of creating "Bum Sacks" while stopped at a red light one morning.  A man was standing on the corner holding a sign that read "Hungry. Anything will help." If you're anything like me you rarely carry cash anymore but  I shuffled around in my purse praying to find a dollar. As the light turned green and I was forced to continue with my commute I began to feel guilty for not having anything to give to this hungry man.  That's when it hit me; people are always contributing a dollar here or there for food but what about the necessities such as gloves, a hat, or even socks? 

Having recently started a job in Tempe, I have noticed just how many homeless people are in need of some extra help.  With the winter months approaching they will need items to keep them warm and healthy especially during our cold desert nights.

What is a Bum Sack?

A Bum Sack is a drawstring backpack filled with some items that will help keep homeless men and women warm and healthy through the winter.  Ideally, each sack will contain a pair of gloves, a beanie, a pair of socks, chap-stick, non-perishable food items, and hygiene products.  The estimated cost of each Bum Sack is about $10 and it is my goal to make and hand out 150 of these before the end of the year. 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please spread the word! Share the link to my campaign on your Facebook or Twitter accounts
  • Volunteer to help deliver the final product!
  • If you work for a company that offers any of the mentioned items see if they are willing to donate. Any donations will be greatly appreciated!

 

 

Help me turn a dollar into so much more for people in need!

story:
A beautifully designed, quarterly magazine that celebrates the Raw Food Lifestyle coupled with knowledge inspiring people to transform their bodies, their lives, and their communities-naturally.

The Magazine

Super Raw Life Magazine supports natural raw vegan living; it’s available for subscription, shipped right to your door and also as a quarterly download at superrawlife.com.

 

We intend to inspire you, one reader at a time, internationally and even globally, by showcasing the raw food diet, or as we like to refer to it, the raw food lifestyle. Our magazine is streamlined with variety broad scope of knowledge from people contributing to the raw food community and enthusiasts who are making a difference in the world by inspiring people to transform their bodies, their lives, and their communities—naturally.

The Founder

I, Michele Marie Jeppson have maintained over 100 pounds weight loss since 2009 by the power of simply eating raw and how that choice trickles into every other aspect of my lifestyle.  What started out as a break to get away has transformed into a lifestyle I love.  Super Raw Life started in 2010 from a homework assignment in a required Graphics Design college class.  Our final project required  us to design the cover of a magazine and 3  spreads.  3 years later, Super Raw Life is preparing to release our 9th issue and getting ready to launch into Stores across the nation with readership in over 120 countries!!

Distribution and Pricing

Super Raw Life will be available at select bookstores, magazine shops and boutiques worldwide. Each issue will cost $14.95 US 17.95 CA.

Subscriptions are available through www.SuperRawLife.com for both print and digital subscriptions.

We hope Super Raw Life is something you will choose to collect and keep alongside your most beloved books.

The Indiegogo Campaign

Our first print run is estimated at 3,500 copies. (We will print additional copies if the demand exists.)

We are looking to raise $6,725, which would cover most of our printing and shipping costs as well as our rewards!

Additionally, we are loving for our Indiegogo campaign helps us build the Super Raw Life community and find potential readers and subscribers who share our values and interests. 

The Future

We hope to offer a beautiful, unique print experience for years to come that explores meaningful people, issues and subjects.

We would love for you to join us on the journey!

Risks and challenges

The magazine business is a challenging one and it is possible that Super Raw Life will fail to find an audience (although 3 years of being a digital magazine and 1 year of print subscription we have a wide audience already loving Super Raw Life) or that future paper, printing and shipping costs will make publication impossible financially.

However, we are optimistic that our subject matter and our quality product will result in success. We also are confident that enough like-minded individuals exist around the world to help this project flourish.  We currently have approval and signed contracts for distribution into both Barnes and Nobles and Whole Foods across the United States.  Now we just need to get the printed copies into stores!  This is where your pledge will make this happen!
story_txt:
A beautifully designed, quarterly magazine that celebrates the Raw Food Lifestyle coupled with knowledge inspiring people to transform their bodies, their lives, and their communities-naturally.The MagazineSuper Raw Life Magazine supports natural raw vegan living; it’s available for subscription, shipped right to your door and also as a quarterly download at superrawlife.com. 

 We intend to inspire you, one reader at a time, internationally and even globally, by showcasing the raw food diet, or as we like to refer to it, the raw food lifestyle. Our magazine is streamlined with variety broad scope of knowledge from people contributing to the raw food community and enthusiasts who are making a difference in the world by inspiring people to transform their bodies, their lives, and their communities—naturally.The FounderI, Michele Marie Jeppson have maintained over 100 pounds weight loss since 2009 by the power of simply eating raw and how that choice trickles into every other aspect of my lifestyle.  What started out as a break to get away has transformed into a lifestyle I love.  Super Raw Life started in 2010 from a homework assignment in a required Graphics Design college class.  Our final project required  us to design the cover of a magazine and 3  spreads.  3 years later, Super Raw Life is preparing to release our 9th issue and getting ready to launch into Stores across the nation with readership in over 120 countries!! Distribution and PricingSuper Raw Life will be available at select bookstores, magazine shops and boutiques worldwide. Each issue will cost $14.95 US 17.95 CA.
Subscriptions are available through www.SuperRawLife.com for both print and digital subscriptions.
We hope Super Raw Life is something you will choose to collect and keep alongside your most beloved books.




The Indiegogo Campaign
Our first print run is estimated at 3,500 copies. (We will print additional copies if the demand exists.)
We are looking to raise $6,725, which would cover most of our printing and shipping costs as well as our rewards!
Additionally, we are loving for our Indiegogo campaign helps us build the Super Raw Life community and find potential readers and subscribers who share our values and interests.  
The Future
We hope to offer a beautiful, unique print experience for years to come that explores meaningful people, issues and subjects.
We would love for you to join us on the journey!

Risks and challenges 
The magazine business is a challenging one and it is possible that Super Raw Life will fail to find an audience (although 3 years of being a digital magazine and 1 year of print subscription we have a wide audience already loving Super Raw Life) or that future paper, printing and shipping costs will make publication impossible financially.
However, we are optimistic that our subject matter and our quality product will result in success. We also are confident that enough like-minded individuals exist around the world to help this project flourish.  We currently have approval and signed contracts for distribution into both Barnes and Nobles and Whole Foods across the United States.  Now we just need to get the printed copies into stores!  This is where your pledge will make this happen!

story:
Join us in helping those in need this holiday season!

On any given day, 170 homeless people are depending on Ocean Park Community Center (OPCC) for temporary shelter, case management and 3 hot meals. That's 3,570 meals a week. And thanks to the generosity of many in-kind donors and volunteer groups, OPCC is able to really stretch their food budget. They only have to spend $2,104 a week to provide a nutritious meal for each resident, 3 times a day.

So, we've decided to help them out this holiday season and sponsor an entire week, 3,570 FULL PLATES, for those served by OPCC.

By providing a basic need, like hot meals, we are helping OPCC's clients to focus on their many other challenges, like chronic physical conditions, substance addiction, and mental illness.  Therefore, the larger benefit of these FULL PLATES isn't just satisfied hunger, it is the freedom we provide to these folks to truly transform their lives.

Would you please join us in this effort?


We have until January 31st to raise enough money to feed everyone at OPCC's interim housing programs for an entire WEEK! 

Please click the Contribute Now button and make your gift today.

Please give as generously as possible and know that every dollar you can give will make a HUGE difference.

Thank you!

Love, Kait, Laura, Maggie, Lizzy, Jane & Rob Powers

P.S. If you'd like to learn more about the work you'd be supporting at OPCC, you can ask Kait - she works there! or please visit www.opcc.org.

story:
Short Summary

Network Brewery is a team of dedicated individuals for the progression of better tasting beers. The Network Brewery’s brewing/tasting location in Santa Ana, Ca, which is currently being built. This is in the heart of Orange County.

We will be taking a different approach in the beer industry. Initially we will be marketing our beer towards action sport industries as this is a market that does not have support by the craft beer scene and many people involved are also involved in these areas. Later as more interested individuals join the team we will go into other markets of their choice. Network Brewery will be collaborating/sponsoring different athletes and athletic teams whom are already on the rise. In connection with these industries we will be putting on sponsored events such as tastings and hosting video premiers. We do this because we love quality beer and are so passionate about the industries we are involved in. Creating the opportunity for both to go hand in hand.

With contribution from those who see our dedication and passion, we will push forth into getting our location up to par. It will help fund our legal requirements, as well as the equipment needed to produce, and store more product, which is mainly kegs. You will help provide a place for beer enthusiasts to meet new people and enjoy a quality beer. 

What We Need & What You Get

$7,085 is our goal. These funds will go straight towards the equipment that we are lacking (kegs) to continue with the opening of our location in Santa Ana California. Kegs are essential to run the business. They are needed to store and ship our product. Being environmentally friendly is our goal. We want to steer away from plastic kegs which is something that needs to be done as current budget is leaving the brewery with the cheaper and more environmental un-friendly option. The funding will provide us with metal kegs that will only make our product that much more enjoyable. If we do not reach the funding goal, the money that is raised will still be spent on the quantity of kegs that we can purchase, still limiting the use of single use kegs. Your incentive to help Network Brewery would help us tremendously and you can get some one of a kind marketing items along with the satisfaction of helping a start up business’s vision come to fruition!     

Other Ways You Can Help

Talk about Network Brewery or come and visit the site! Swing by if you’re in the area to hang out and taste some of the quality hand crafted flavors. Make sure to use the Indiegogo share tool as well to let everyone know. 

Visit us at:

<!--[if !supportEmptyParas]--> www.networkbrewery.com

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Network-Brewery/...

story:
Short Summary

Oceania Johnson grew up in the foster care system. During this time she was separated from her parents and her brothers. Oceania dealt with feelings of abandonment and low self-esteem that eventually caused behavioral issues. Over time Oceania has overcome these obstacles and is now a honor roll student that wants to teach young people to love themselves and to never let their circumstances define them. Recently Oceania was selected to participate in Miss Teen Houston. Less than half of the girls that auditioned made the cut. The girls that compete all need sponsorships. Sponsorships can be from companies or individuals. Any amount small or large is a great help. By donating to this campaign you will help Oceania do the following:

  • Spread her message of healthy self-esteem, anti-bullying, and overcoming life situations
  • Help cover pageant expenses such as entry fees and gowns
  • Live out her dream to become teen royalty and a good example to other young girls

CALL 1-877-403-6678 TO SPONSOR OCEANIA

What We Need & What You Get

  • Oceania needs sponsorships in order to compete. Any amount small or large is helpful
  • Sponsors will get a personal thank you note from Oceania and other perks as listed below.
  • All funds raised will go towards the pageant. If the goal is not met the family will come up with the remainder of the money to cover expenses. CALL 1-877-403-6678 TO SPONSOR OCEANIA

The Impact

My name is Blair Fisher and I am Oceania's guardian. She quickly became a very important part of my family. This pageant is very important to Oceania. Growing up Oceania had really bad acne and struggled with weight gain. She was often the center of cruel jokes and felt really bad about herself. Because of this, her mission in life is to let girls know that they are perfect even in their imperfections and that life is always worth living. She has three nieces that she is a great example to and the children in her sunday school class absolutely love her. Oceania has a big heart and desires to do great things. This pageant is a great opportunity to further develop her self-esteem, public speaking skills, and etiquette.

CALL 1-877-403-6678 TO SPONSOR OCEANIA

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share the YouTube video on this page
  • Share using Indiegogo tools
  • Donate your time. Maybe you are a professional hairstylist, photographer, makeup artist, or can donate pageant dresses. Donating time or resources can drastically help this cause

CALL 1-877-403-6678 TO SPONSOR OCEANIA

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
ABOUT BED-STUY BOUNTY

Bed-Stuy Bounty is an owner-run food buying club coordinated by third-generation Bed-Stuy resident Melissa Danielle, Health Coach, Local Food Advocate, and Social Storyteller. 

Launched in 2012, Bed-Stuy Bounty's Good Food Club uses Wholeshare.com to place orders directly with the same distributors and farmers that sell to our favorite NYC grocers and at farmers markets. 

Wholeshare's flat, nominal markup offers significant savings on groceries by allowing members to order wholesale and in bulk. 

Our members pay an annual membership fee or a per-order charge, which covers the logistical expenses of receiving and processing their orders. 

THE VISION

As a localist, Melissa Danielle believes that local economies are an integral part of a community's health and sustainability, in which community-based asset development, local accountability, relationship building, and local ownership are prioritized. 

Bed-Stuy Bounty accomplishes this by being locally owned, active, and collaborative within the community. 

At just under sixty members, the club is managed at Melissa's home. We are looking for a more suitable location to receive orders and serve as a clubhouse for meetings, events classes, and more. 

In the next two years, Bed-Stuy Bounty aims to grow to 500 members with a seasonal weekly indoor market, and from two pickup locations to five. We also want to launch a good food fund, which would allow us to establish a revolving loan fund to accept SNAP payments and support a community food donation program. 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

We are looking to increase our visibility and raise money for a dedicated space and our good food fund. Your contribution will support this effort by helping us cover the overhead expenses of renting a space and increasing our marketing and outreach. 

Even if you can't make a contribution, you can help us by spreading the word about Bed-Stuy Bounty through your networks, and if you live in Bed-Stuy, becoming a member yourself. 

Thank you for your support!

story:
Summary

Hello, I'm Shaletha Litt. I'm a graduate of Florida A&M University (FAMU) currently pursuing an MBA with a focus in Entrepreneurship at Georgia State University where I am set to graduate this December. I currently work in payroll & HR sales and thus work with several business owners. Previously, I was a bank branch manager and small business lender, so I have supported and built relationships with all types of small businesses over the years. I have always been passionate about entrepreneurship and have always had a desire to operate my own business. I feel that everything I've done education and career-wise has helped to prepare me for this endeavor. 

Your contribution will help me achieve a life-long dream. 

With the funds raised, I will be able to open the first Tropical Smoothie Cafe in Cobb county and other future locations throughout the Atlanta area.

Why Tropical Smoothie

I chose Tropical Smoothie because of the surge in interest in the health food & nutrition industry. Tropical Smoothie Cafe has delicious and nutritious offerings for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Options include fresh fruit smoothies, sandwiches, flatbreads, wraps, salads, and sides that include fruit, chips, granola, and trail mix. 

Tropical Smoothie is a franchise that has already proven to have a successful concept and thrives in its current markets. (Google reviews and see for yourself!)  Right now, they are looking to break into the Atlanta market and duplicate the success they have in other cities and I want the opportunity to be a part of this venture.

Why I Will Be Successful 

I am both thankful and humbled to have a great support network composed of friends, family, and fellow alumnus from FAMU and Georgia State. Additionally, my father, a retired veteran of the US ARMY, has agreed to go in on this business venture with me. With his support and status, we can take advantage of several benefits awarded to veterans. For example, we plan to pursue catering contracts locally and on the nearby military base (Dobbins AFB) where they honor Veterans First. Veterans First is a program where businesses and government entities alike give consideration to military veterans first when bidding on service contracts which gives us a great advantage.
Additionally, I have lots of ideas for community involvement and programs such as health and wellness events, local sponsorships, scholarships, etc. We also have ideas to differentiate product offerings once we build more rapport with the franchise. 

What I Need & What's in it for You

The Breakdown:

  • In order to receive funding, I need to bring a minimum of $20,000 cash to the table. The $10,000 that I am hoping to raise with your support will help me make up for my current shortfall.
  • In the event that I don't raise the full $10,000 within the 60-day period, I will continue to save until I do and then pursue an SBA loan to fund the build out, marketing and initial start-up costs; so no matter what, any and all contributions will go towards this project.
  • Everyone who contributes in any way, shape or form will be invited to the Grand Opening and will receive their first smoothie or food item for FREE as a Thank You for your support.

Other Ways You Can Help

In the event that you can't contribute financially, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Word of mouth is vital for this type of operation so spreading the word to friends, family, and others via social media and other outlets is a great way to show support.
  • Please feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Less than a year ago I started perfect Lady Aromatherapy Cleaning with the idea that I wanted to give the best service as well as the best cleaning.  During the early phase of my business realized I did not like the chemical products I was using and decided to go green.  The products I found on the market were "Green Washed"; they too had chemical in them that were harmful.  After careful research I decided to make my own products from essential oils.  I enjoyed making them and using them, the response from my clients was one of excitement and admiration.  The performance of the products I was creating were better than the chemical ones and the "Green Washed" Cleaners.  I just couldn't keep these amazing products to myself; I wanted to share them with the world.


What We Need & What You Get

The funds from this project  will go toward making these products available to a wider audience online and in stores.  A lot of people are looking for an alternative to using chemicals and I would love for them to use my products.  Our products are all natural and not "Green Washed", you will be proud knowing you are not using chemical, which, will aid your health and the environment.  We are looking to raise $5000 which we will utilize in packaging, marketing, web design and business development.  

We are offering:

Delicious Citrus Dish washing Liquid

Ingredients:

  • Castile soap (all natural and organic)
  • Lemon Essential oil
  • Grapefruit Essential oil

This is not just a dish washing soap!! By adding:

2 Cups of water +

1 teaspoon Dish washing liquid

You have a all purpose cleaner that can be utilized to clean anything.  Natural products are multi-functional, therefore, you will only need one product that be used for many things.  


Delicious Citrus Soft Scrubber

Ingredients:

  • Baking soda
  • Borax
  • Cream of Tartar
  • Goats Milk
  • Washing Soda
  • Lemon Essential oil
  • Grapefruit Essential oil

I love this product because the milk gives it a divine texture.  Apart from scrubbing pots and pans you can use it to scrub your bathroom!


Delicious Citrus Air refresher 

Ingredients:

  • Vodka
  • Infused Lemon
  • Infused Grapefruit
  • Lemon Essential oils
  • Grapefruit Essential oils

This can be used as an all around home air refresher!  Kills orders and not just mask them.  

    The Impact

    We all have the ability to change the world and it won't happen over night, however, one small step in the right direction will make for a better future for our selves and generations to come.  Perfect Lady Aromatherapy Cleaning want to help every one change their health and the environment one day at a time through Aromatherapy Cleaning/ All natural Cleaning Products.

    Risks & Challenges

    Time is always a challenge; Making the time and having the space to work is essential.  It is hard working from my apartment but I am so excited about these products I am making that  I have dedicated a space as my work area to make products.  Getting them into your hands is another factor, but I will do everything in my power that every one can have the experience and joy of cleaning their home naturally.




    Please note all orders over $15 are qualified for free shipping in NYC and the 5 boroughs.  "Your in it to win it" contribution is only for NYC residents and those in the 5 boroughs.  If you would still like to make that contribution we will be very happy to accept and thank you!  Thanks every one for reading this and contributing in any which way you can!!!

We all have the ability to change the world and it won't happen over night, however, one small step in the right direction will make for a better future for our selves and generations to come.  Perfect Lady Aromatherapy Cleaning want to help every one change their health and the environment one day at a time through Aromatherapy Cleaning/ All natural Cleaning Products. Risks & Challenges
Time is always a challenge; Making the time and having the space to work is essential.  It is hard working from my apartment but I am so excited about these products I am making that  I have dedicated a space as my work area to make products.  Getting them into your hands is another factor, but I will do everything in my power that every one can have the experience and joy of cleaning their home naturally. 


Please note all orders over $15 are qualified for free shipping in NYC and the 5 boroughs.  "Your in it to win it" contribution is only for NYC residents and those in the 5 boroughs.  If you would still like to make that contribution we will be very happy to accept and thank you!  Thanks every one for reading this and contributing in any which way you can!!!

story:
It's a challenge to raise children anywhere, but in Haiti the obstacles seem to be endless.

Our orphanage, Fondasyon Foyer des Enfants, was founded with good intentions but with no resources. And so we are launching this campaign to begin raising the funds that we so desperately need.

Today, we are fighting to secure food, healthcare and education to the 20 children at our orphanage. Your generosity will enable us to deliver the absolute necessities to our kids throughout the holiday season-- it is the greatest gift imaginable.

In Bon Repos, it costs roughly $145 each month to deliver complete care to a child. That modest amount is incredibly hard to come by in Haiti.

  • $12 per month — health insurance: Health insurance covers regular check-ups, emergency hospitilization and most medications when necessary.
  • $20 per month — education: The cost of education provides teachers and school supplies to children with no other access to education.
  • $20 per month — necessities: Basic items such as mosquito nets, shoes and clothing can be purchased for this modest amount.
  • $93 per month — food, water: Most of our children are even more malnourished than those living at neighoring orphanages, we urgently need to purchase fruit, vegetables and vitamins for our children. $93 per month covers the cost of 3 meals per day for an entire month.

Our kids want to know you!
Because our orphanage is far removed from the city, we rarely get visitors — but our 20 children love to meet new people. All of our donors will be connected with children at our orphanage through letters and photos. We are so grateful for your contributions and want you to become a part of our community. 

AND we are making a special reward for the Holiday Season. If you are sponsor a child as a holiday gift, we will send a special 'thank you' card to the recipient of your choosing complete with a locally made craft from Haiti.

story: My name is LaTia White. I am a registered nurse of 8 years, specializing in maternal-child health.  In addition, I am a mother of 4 children, one of which is my medically-fragile foster child.  BABIES are my PASSION! Inspired by "Baby G" (my foster child) I am running this campaign in an effort to raise money to benefit a non-profit, "Miraculous Foundation, Inc."  With this, I also plan to establish a medical daycare, and continue to educate, provide resources, and be a advocate for pregnant women and their children.  I am driven to embark on this journey simply because....HELPING BABIES is what I LOVE to do!

story:
Change the world, support community, create jobs, and feed the planet.

Conventional BIG BUSINESS FARMING is no longer cutting the mustard. The consumer (You) is simply becoming smarter.

For instance; did you know that the average fruit and vegetable found in our grocery store travels over 1700 miles from farm to table. And, it's picked before it's ripened, then gasified before it's put onto grocery store shelves. Not only that, think of all of the resources that are consumed in growing and transporting a little head of lettuce.

People, food, water, land, fossil fuels, innovation and the economy…

With your help, we bring community together, cultivate an unused piece of property, and turn it into a state-of-the-art-farm that virtually doubles land capacity, provides solution to conserving natural resources and creates jobs in one fell swoop!

Change the world. Join the team today! Sponsor a sprout and inspire others! You become part of the first ever virtual farmer’s network where we embrace innovative solutions, our natural resources and the quality of food we eat.

The secret to the Eco Grow Farms is in our SEED™. Our Sustainable Energy Efficient Design (SEED) is the catalyst that enables a localized food supply and invigorates economy.

WATER

When you think about it… we literally have spacecraft traveling to the far ends of the universe in search for water.

Water = life, resources, food and our future.

This is our opportunity to do it better. With your contribution, you will join The Seed today, Feed Tomorrow campaign. The goal… to preserve life’s requirements today! Take the Seven Seed challenge and you will be invited into an exclusive community where you will literally watch your seed grow via a time lapsed video. Eco Grow Farms will nurture and ensure your little seed multiplies into many more. Feed the future, seed today!

The solution

Formerly used as a warehousing facility, this 13.5 acre piece of property has been vacant since 2009. And, today presents itself as a perfect opportunity to improve the way we do things in the world of healthy food. With the advent of Innovation, hard work and your help together we can set the benchmark for the future and turn 13 acres into 26 acres of year round food production. This opportunity will forever change the way we think about food.

The physical farm/plant is a proprietary Sustainable Energy Efficient Design (SEED™).  SEED™ is a comprehensive advanced micro grid energy management system proprietary to Eco Grow Farms. The grow system will be powered onsite. The incorporation of our advanced SEED™ system is the fundamental component to controlling the cost challenges associated with sustaining a long term success of producing nearly 800,000 organic crops per year.

Environmental control

Not only do we have to consider new ideas when it comes to food security, but growing food the Eco Grow Farms way will provide a protected environment in order to ensure the quality of the harvest and yield meets the ever growing demand. Our system uses about 90% less resources and yields an average ratio of 10 to 1, above and beyond conventional farming methods. Let’s face it, climatic weather events have, and will continue to be a threat to the food supply and will continue driving higher costs onto dinner tables world-wide.

Somebody needs to lead the way and this is your opportunity to do it better. This is a crucial factor in society’s access to our food supply now and in the future. Sad but true, food is a natural resource that our ever growing population shall have to fight to keep. Let’s fix it today

What We Need

1st Goal: Crowd fund and raise $3.5 million dollars.

Purpose: Purchase a 13.5 acre parcel of commercial land, clean it up, and convert the property to a farm that generates 26 acres of food production capacity.

Your generosity will help us reach 30% of the total cost and provide a myriad of solutions all under one roof. Together we will make the world a better place!

What You Get

No matter what your contribution may be, we realize it comes from the heart and for that we sincerely thank you all for helping to make this world a better place! 

The Impact

Society can no longer just be reliant on big business, and government to make the choices about the foods we eat. Change starts with you and I making little contributions.

Do you want to change?

Do you want to create a better food source for our children?

Do you want to protect vital “Natural” resources?

Do you want to do it better?

Do you want to be a part of creating jobs and building economy?

Do you want to help build a stronger community?

Do you want to make the world a better place?

If you have answered yes to anyone or all of these questions, then you understand the impact and benefits we can bring.

With just a $7 dollar contribution you can sponsor a sprout, feed the planet, create jobs, and forever change the world.

Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges are; we don’t raise enough capital to execute the plan in full capacity and we have to do extend the time to build this state of the art farm. The one thing not on our side is time. And, that’s why the time to act is now.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • We ask to help spread the word out and make some noise about our SEED TODAY FEED TOMORROW campaign.
  • Make sure you use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

We sincerely thank you! (visit www.ecogrowfarms.com)

story:
The Market
Order Online or from your Favorite Store for "Same Day Delivery"
Largest Online Stores are eager to increase their capabilities of servicing their consumers with the fastest delivery service.  With Yelivery.com, Same Day Delivery service will be performed seamlessly with an automated order processing at the time you check out and you can monitor through a mobile application.  Bricks and mortar retail Stores can also set up an affiliate account and service their customer base of this unique network of Yeli-Couriers.  The Online Order with Same Day Delivery will be available at major cities as Online Stores join our network.  Retail Stores with no physical presence in the major cities can also take advantage as small distribution centers (DCs) will be set up for those hot products that your customers need them today!

* Order before 11:00 am and receive the order the Same Day for as low as $9.95
* Order after 11:00am and receive the order the Next Day for as low as $9.95


Your Personal Yeli-Courier - with just a few clicks!
Personal couriers is a very convenient alternative for special occasions you want to send a parcel to a friend or business, but sometimes your time is limited during the day.  Anybody that requires a pick up and delivery service in your local area, Yeli-Couriers will be there for you.  


Mobile App Download and Membership are FREE!!!!! 

YELIVERY.COM - THE NEW GENERATION OF SAME DAY DELIVERY SERVICE!

Sign Up as Consumer or Business 


CONSUMERS -  Easy to Set up your Profile and use your Personal Yeli-Courier


ONLINE, RETAIL STORES AND BUSINESSES - Set up Commercial Settings and you are ready to Yeliver!


ORDER ONLINE AND GET THE MERCHANDISE DELIVERED THE SAME DAY - WOW!




WITH SEAMLESS DELIVERY - YOU WILL EXPERIENCE THE MOST ACCURATE AND RELIABLE SERVICE 


USERS (BUSINESSES OR CONSUMERS) CAN CREATE A PICK UP AND/OR DELIVERY REQUEST WITH JUST A FEW CLICKS.  OUR YELI-COURIERS TEAM WILL BE READY TO ASSIST YOU!

1) Request a Pick Up and Determine the Distance



2) Enter package information: number of pieces, package size (small, medium, and large), and estimated weight (see also HELP).  Yelivery calculates the rate for you!  Not Sure the package size, go to help in your profile!

  

3) After you Press YES - Yeli-Courier is in route for another seamless Delivery!


4) Text Message Updates keep you informed of where the parcel is!



YOUR PACKAGE WAS SUCCESSFULLY DELIVERED BY YELI-COURIER MEMBER MR. JOSEPH SMITH!


NEED HELP Go to your Profile any time! - Learn how Yelivery Works!  Yelivery automatically calculates the rates for you with this simple format.

What is the Package Size?


FAVORITES - For future Same Day Deliveries!  


Yeli-Couriers
This is a tremendous opportunity of anybody that would like to have an extra income.  Independent service providers with a bike, motorcycle, car, SUV or Dry Van can become a Yeli-Courier with the ability to work your own hours or a full time job.  The earnings are very attractive ranging from $21.00 up to $50.00 an hour depending on the location and the type of Same Day Delivery.


Potential Markets 

There are many ways you can take advantage of the system depending on the situation.  Businesses can coordinate pick ups and deliveries of sensitive documents or other products.  The concept would revolutionize the Same Day Delivery market as it would be the fastest, most efficient, and less expensive delivery service in the industry.  Contributors will be highly motivated as the business model will provide a new level of service and generate "thousands" of jobs to the economy nationwide.  And of course, this model also applies to other countries and it will be available very soon.

  • Healthcare Industry (hospitals, laboratories, care centers)
  • Auto Parts Stores
  • Clothing in General (shoes, accessories, etc...)
  • Sport Goods Stores
  • Federal Government Offices
  • Municipalities
  • Real Estates Agents 
  • Lawyers
  • Freight Forwarders
  • Customs House Brokers
  • Distributors of small parts and accessories
  • Groceries, Supermarkets
  • Pharmacies
  • Medicine Distributors
  • Executive offices 
  • Residential - personal effects, documents, etc...
  • And many more... 
  

What We Need & What You Get

Yelivery.com is a start up business opportunity!  In order to have the most complete application for smartphones and tablets, we require a team of experienced software developers.  Therefore, the initial funding is to complete the developing of the "proprietary software", the advertising campaign, and to launch the application for IOS and Android users.  

Same Day Delivery Service in the USA is a $12.2 Billion dollar industry between local couriers for general merchandise with $8.7 Billion and food delivery restaurants with $3.5 Billion.  Our goal is to become the preferred courier system changing the course of the industry to a new dimension.  Yelivery.com can change the game!

The main objective is to develop and launch the application as soon as possible.  However, if for any reason the first stage of funding is not achieved, my campaign will continue contacting private technology related investors for the remaining funding and growth.  The funds accumulated represent a group of visionaries users with the desire to enjoy the benefits of the best Same Day Delivery System.  The efforts will continue until the start up is fully operational.

_____________________________________________________________________________

YELIVERY HIGHLIGHTS!

* Online Order for Same Day Delivery

* Request a Hold for Pick Up of your favorite Store or Online Order for Same Day Delivery

* Your Personal Courier at your Finger Tips for any special need!

* The most competitive Same Day Delivery Rates in the Market

* The most complete Monitoring System in a mobile app.

* BYOD - Yeli-Couriers represents thousands of Jobs

* Expansion in major cities of the USA and overseas

* Arrange a Same Day Delivery from any city and anywhere in the world.

* Place orders from your favorite affiliate Store through Yelivery Mobile App.

_____________________________________________________________________________


FACTS ABOUT THE SMARTPHONES USERS - Mobile App Yelivery is the best alternative for Same Day Delivery Service


The Impact

As founder and CEO, I envision Yelivery.com as the future of the Same Day Delivery service surpassing other methods and technologies for delivering packages.  The service is suitable to major cities and its suburbs nationwide.  Online stores, brick and mortar stores, businesses, healthcare providers, personal use can take advantage of yelivery.com for their scheduled and non-scheduled pick ups and deliveries.  Yelivery.com has endless uses depending on your specific needs.

Proof of concept!  
Same day delivery is daily activity that all consumers and businesses are pleased to have in their area.  The online delivery system in a simple to use mobile application is what makes the difference for the consumer creating a new dimension of the service.  The Yelivery mobile application will improve the lifestyle of many people!


About the Founder

Born in Puerto Rico and raised in the Dominican Republic.  My professional career started in 1987 with Federal Express Corporation in the Dominican Republic.  In 1991, I moved to the United States and worked for International Bonded Couriers Inc., a wholesale courier company servicing Latin America, USA, and Europe. Years later I took the position of Sales Executive at DANZAS Corporation a worldwide freight forwarder (currently DHL Global Forwarding).   In 1995, founded Coletti International Corporation to serve as an export company supplying intermodal and cargo handling equipments integrating transportation services to my clients overseas.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Qualified professionals are always welcome and I do appreciate anybody who wants to join our team.  I am a true believer of sharing ideas and teamwork!

story:
Short Summary

We are Ekey a Pharmacist from the UK and Elana a Public Health professional from the US. We met in Ghana while volunteering in public health. Our work opened our eyes to the need for youth development opportunities, and the need to spread the word about TB. So here we are with a program where 30 youth from Ghana's Awutu Senya Municipal will be selected through a competitive application process to participate in a summer youth fellowship program. The program will create a platform for youth to gain experience in public health education, and reduce transmission of TB through community based health education. Youth will also act as bridges to care, referring individuals with symptoms of the disease for diagnostic testing at a local clinic's disease control unit.


What We Need & What You Get

  • Each youth will be given  50 ghc at the end of the fellowship program.  In total we need 1500 ghc equivalent of approximately $400. to sponsor 30 youth. 
  • We also need to pay for transportation for youth to do community outreach 
  • You would have helped reduce TB in Ghana. A disease that kills as many as 1.5 million globally. 
  • You would also make possible a  summer work opportunity for low income youth, helping to develop and shape young lives. 

This fellowship will be implemented by the Cheerful Hearts Foundation, a community based organization in Ghana. 


Risks & Challenges

This fellowship  idea was sparked by volunteers Ekey and Elana who volunteered in Ghana in public health education. 

  • This fellowship brings education directly to communities, one of the keys in reducing TB
  • In places like Ghana, opportunities for youth to impact the public health of their communities and earn some form of income is not common; this fellowship opens a new door for youth. 

Other Ways You Can Help


  • Spread the word, help us, fund the youth stipends and get them into the field too!!!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Short Summary We are Ekey a Pharmacist from the UK and Elana a Public Health professional from the US. We met in Ghana while volunteering in public health. Our work opened our eyes to the need for youth development opportunities, and the need to spread the word about TB. So here we are with a program where 30 youth from Ghana's Awutu Senya Municipal will be selected through a competitive application process to participate in a summer youth fellowship program. The program will create a platform for youth to gain experience in public health education, and reduce transmission of TB through community based health education. Youth will also act as bridges to care, referring individuals with symptoms of the disease for diagnostic testing at a local clinic's disease control unit.
   What We Need & What You Get

story:
Short Summary

In 2012 I finished my honours degree in business with a concentration in Marketing at Wilfrid Laurier University. In my first year and a half out of school I worked at a software company in sales and business development. It was a business to business sales position where I did a lot of prospecting as well as following up on leads to establish meaningful business relationships. My experience there allowed me to learn the techniques and tactics required to break down the initial barriers and sales tension with prospective customers and start a relationship on the right foot. From this position I became a lot more comfortable with speaking with people and it allowed me to connect and network with a lot of individuals outside of my job.

Utilizing this valuable experience as well as my educational background I decided I was at the ideal place in my life to begin my own business. I am currently in a program that teaches you all the fundamentals of selling products on Amazon. As many know Amazon is a huge platform that sells an array of products in a buyers market. I have already dealt with suppliers for my product and packaging over the last two months. With all the costs of doing a bulk order of my first product I have realized that funds are going to be dry. 

I have created my company name, packaging, design of the toiletry bag and am about a week away from its official launch. Shipping has proven very difficult and costly. As November, December, and January are the highest selling months for my particular product I have created this campaign to help push my launch in the right direction.

I have done extensive research on the competition on Amazon. The keyword itself gets 160000 searches on Amazon per month and the top competition is only selling around 5 items per day during the off season.

I have always wanted to start my own business and this seems like an ample time to do so. I know that my story is not as compelling as others but I had no where else to turn. I have many expenses in my life that are draining my funds and having a huge impact on my budget.

This little bit of funding will help my business enter the market. I have no doubt from that first product launch that I will be able to sell my products and earn the cash flow needed to sustain and grow the business from there. I am at a crucial part in my launch and need whatever help I can get.

I thank all for any contributions whether it be monetary, sound advice, sharing of my story, or even words of encouragement.

What We Need & What You Get

The $2000 campaign is meant to be used on the costs of packaging, producing, and shipping my first product from China to USA.

This funding will help me launch my first product. I have already reached out to a lot of people in my niche who will be helping with my first promotion so sales will be ramping up as soon as my product is listed. The $2000 will help me get that product from China to the USA and listed on Amazon. From there I will be able to use the profits of my sales to reinvest in my company and deliver a larger order for the next delivery.

If I don't reach my entire goal whatever funds I achieve will be going into a smaller batch order of my product to be shipped over and listed. This will help me in establishing my products presence. However, a smaller batch is not as cost-effective given Amazons terms and fees. If I do enter a smaller order it will give me the ability to show on paper sales and further costs to put into my business plan for future funding.

    The Impact

    These contributions will help a young inspired entrepreneur achieve his dreams. I have always wanted to start my own business but have been hesitant to put my ideas into place for fear of failure. I have finally found a niche, product, and area that I know I can succeed if I can just get my product up and running.

    The sky is the limit after the successful launch of my first product. I will be expanding my line and building my brand from there. I just need this little pump to get me through the door and on track to achieving my dreams.

    Risks & Challenges

    The biggest risk and challenge is once I enter the market my competition cloning what I am doing. This is why I need to breakthrough with some ample sales in order to rank myself higher.

    I have done extensive research on my competition - monitoring their sales, promotions, and their external efforts on Amazon.

    With my current marketing campaign I have in place and ready to launch once my product arrives I have no doubt I will be able to push myself up the rankings quickly above my competition.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you cannot spare any change or do not believe in this cause please just share it with someone who may. I also would definitely appreciate any advice, words of wisdom, or just some words of encouragement. I appreciate you all just for having a look.
